name: Sentinels of the Multiverse - Soundtrack (Volume 8)
detailed_description:
Own the music from OblivAeon - the final, worlds-ending expansion to Sentinels of the Multiverse: The Video Game! Includes environment music, OblivAeon music and more!

Composed and performed by Jean-Marc Giffin, this soundtrack includes all music created for and appearing in OblivAeon, the mega-expansion for Sentinels of the Multiverse: The Video Game.

Full Track Listing:
1. Champion Studios
2. Maerynian Refuge
3. Mordengrad
4. Nexus of the Void
5. Fort Adamant
6. The End Has Come
7. Destroyer of All
8. Terminus of All Realities
9. The Multiverse Is Saved
10. Oblivaeon-powered Overlord
11. Conqueror of Realities
12. Bottom of the 9th Ending

This soundtrack is comprised of 320kbps MP3 files. You must have Sentinels of the Multiverse installed to receive the DLC content.

short_description: Listen to the music of the Multiverse, wherever you are!
